TopicTitle: Adding and Removing Modules to a part

Articles.Content: For the mod I am developing I need to be able to add the science lab module to a part and then remove it I have tried using part.AddMdule("ModuleScienceLab") but that does not seem to work. does anywone know how to correctley use the part.AddModule and part.RemoveModule methods?

myVessel.rootPart.AddModule("foo");

does it for me..

where do you have the var "part" from?
thanks the part varablie is from partModule and refers to the part that the module is attached to.
